Name: Name
Provide a unique name for the new Bare M: Provide a unique name for the new Bare Metal Host.
The MAC address of the NIC connected to: The MAC address of the NIC connected to the network that will be used to provision the host.
Provide credentials for the hosts basebo: Provide credentials for the hosts baseboard management controller (BMC) device to enable OpenShift to control its power state. This is required for automatic machine health check remediation.
The URL for communicating with the hosts: The URL for communicating with the hosts baseboard management controller device.
Disable verification of server certifica: Disable verification of server certificates when using HTTPS to connect to the BMC. This is required when the server certificate is self-signed, but is insecure because it allows a man-in-the-middle to intercept the connection.

Expand the hardware inventory by registe: Expand the hardware inventory by registering a new Bare Metal Host.

Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} machine and scale down its machine set?
Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} machine?
Node is entering maintenance. The cluste: Node is entering maintenance. The cluster will automatically rebuild node's data 30 minutes after entering maintenance.
Node is under maintenance. The cluster w: Node is under maintenance. The cluster will automatically rebuild node's data 30 minutes after entering maintenance.
Workloads currently running on this host: Workloads currently running on this host will not be moved before restarting. This may cause service disruptions.
Workloads currently running on this host will not be moved before powering off. This may cause service disruptions.
all workloads have already been moved.
all workloads have already been moved, b: all workloads have already been moved, but {{length}} static pods have been skipped.

The host will be powered off gracefully.
To power off gracefully, <2>start mainte: To power off gracefully, <2>start maintenance</2> on this host to move all managed workloads to other nodes in the cluster.
Workloads will not be moved before the h: Workloads will not be moved before the host powers off.
The host will power off immediately as i: The host will power off immediately as if it were unplugged.
Host is ready to be gracefully powered o: Host is ready to be gracefully powered off. The host is currently under maintenance and {{message}}
Host is ready to be gracefully powered off.
The bare metal host is not healthy.
The host cannot be powered off gracefull: The host cannot be powered off gracefully untils its health is restored.
The node cannot be powered off gracefull: The node cannot be powered off gracefully until it finishes entering maintenance.
The node cannot be powered off gracefully while it is exiting maintenance.
These DaemonSets will prevent some pods: These DaemonSets will prevent some pods from being moved. This should not prevent the host from powering off gracefully.
This host contains unmanaged static pods: This host contains unmanaged static pods.
These pods must be moved manually to con: These pods must be moved manually to continue running after the host powers off.
The host will be powered off and on agai: The host will be powered off and on again.
All managed workloads will be moved off: All managed workloads will be moved off of this node. New workloads and data will not be added to this node until maintenance is stopped.
If the node does not exit maintenance wi: If the node does not exit maintenance within <1>30 minutes</1>, the cluster will automatically rebuild the node's data using replicated copies
The Ceph storage cluster is not in a hea: The Ceph storage cluster is not in a healthy state.
Maintenance should not be started until: Maintenance should not be started until the health of the storage cluster is restored.
Are you sure you want to stop maintenanc: Are you sure you want to stop maintenance <1>{reasonLabel}</1> on node <4>{nodeName}</4>?
The host is available to be provisioned: The host is available to be provisioned as a node.
The hardware details of the host are bei: The hardware details of the host are being collected. This will take a while. The host will become available when finished.
An image is being written to the host: An image is being written to the host
The image is being wiped from the host: The image is being wiped from the host
Collecting hardware details from the hos: Collecting hardware details from the host failed.
The image could not be written to the ho: The image could not be written to the host.
An error was found while trying to power: An error was found while trying to power the host either on or off.
This host was provisioned outside of thi: This host was provisioned outside of this cluster and added manually.
Power operations cannot be performed on: Power operations cannot be performed on this host until Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) credentials are provided.
Name must consist of lower case alphanum: Name must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters, hyphens or dots, and must start and end with an alphanumeric character.
